issue.title: [CF 989] Spell Charges Conditional not saving
issue.body:
I noticed this on the live version as well, but this is using version 7.0.2-135-gae07cb3 from Warlords Beta build on the Beta client.

Here I set the Spell Charges conditional to 3 using the slide bar:
http://imgur.com/8IGvjLK

When I click on the main tab then go back to the conditional tab this occurs:
http://imgur.com/uhCTHQ3

The number it changes to when the slider is set to 3 changes to 7.  When I click the main tab then back to the conditional tab again it changes to 9 then 11, 13, and so on always in +2 jumps after the initial jump.  If I right click and don't use the slider and manually type in the 3 it works and remembers it.

I think the pictures should direct you wizards to replicate it, but here's the export string:
^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SForce~`of~`Nature ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^STALENTLEARNED ^SName^SForce~`of~`Nature ^t^N2^T ^SType^SSPELLCHARGES ^SOperator^S>= ^SLevel^N7 ^SName^SForce~`of~`Nature ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^SType^T ^STextLayout^S ^t^t^SFakeHidden^B ^SEnabled^B ^t^N71034^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Thanks for all your hard work on this addon.


> Posted by CurseForge user John454ss | Imported from CurseForge issue #989 | Raw
